subtasks: Determine the pest to control and select the appropriate chemical
Choose the right formulation (liquid or dry) for the pesticide
Read and understand the pesticide label
Protect your body with full coverage clothing and appropriate gloves (neoprene)
Wear protective goggles or a face shield when applying pesticides
Avoid skin contact and inhalation of pesticides; read first aid instructions
Use low pressure spray to minimize drift and apply with the wind at your back
Keep unauthorized individuals, children, and pets away from application areas
Dispose of containers properly by washing and destroying them after use
Store pesticides in original labeled containers, in a cool, dry place away from water sources

tasks.task: Safe Storage and Transportation of Pesticides
subtasks: Place pesticide containers in a plastic tub for transport in a pickup truck
Secure the transport container and ensure it can hold spillage
Store pesticides on a cement floor in a well-ventilated building
Keep pesticides away from water bodies and ensure no seepage into groundwater
Use a dike or sawdust to contain spills and dispose of them in a special landfill
Avoid applying pesticides during moderate or strong winds

tasks.task: Safe Storage and Transportation of Pesticides
